author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
Almost 10 years ago we saw the launch of the Steam Machines and the Steam Universe and as of late there's been a bunch of Valve leaks that seem to indicate that something of the sort is in the works again, that being a new device code named fremont

title: Is Fremont the Rebirth Of Valve's Steam Machines
